title: St. Louis Cardinals revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 18 data points.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 356.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 123.0 was reached at Year 2001
